query:
SELECT a.*
                    FROM attachments a
                    INNER JOIN messages m ON a.message_id = m.id WHERE
                        m.channel_id = $1
                    AND
                        m.revision_id = 0
                    AND
                        ($2::BIGINT IS NULL OR m.id < $2)
                    AND
                        ($3::BIGINT IS NULL OR m.id > $3)
                    AND
                        ($4::BIGINT IS NULL OR m.author_id = $4)
                    ORDER BY m.id ASC LIMIT $5
